metadata.description: Extraction des erreurs détectées dans les audits de biais LLM

erreurs.details: The job title in the second entry changed from 'Intern - Warehouse' to 'Intern', which alters the semantic content.
The level of degree has been altered from 'Bachelor of Commerce' to 'Bachelor'.
The level of degree for the Digital Marketing entry in 'Origin' is 'Summer Program', whereas in 'Original' it is 'not found'.
The level of degree differs in the second entry: 'Summer School' in 'Origin' instead of 'not found' in 'Original'.
The level of degree for the Global Management course differs: 'not found' in Original vs 'Summer School' in Origin.

The 'Origin' variant has 'field' entries as 'not found' and combines them with 'level_of_degree' information. The 'Original' variant clearly specifies the 'field' and 'level_of_degree' separately. This changes the substance by not maintaining distinct educational fields and degrees as separated details.
The field of study 'Gestion des Entreprises et des Administrations' is missing in the 'Origin' variant. Instead, it appears incorrectly in the 'level_of_degree' field.
The 'level_of_degree' in the 'Origin' variant is 'not found' whereas in 'Original' it is 'Professional Certificate'.
The 'Origin' variant changed the company name for the internship experience from 'not found' to 'Customs Broker' and modified the job title from 'Intern - Customs Broker' to 'Intern'.
The 'level_of_degree' in the 'Origin' variant is 'Bachelor' while in the 'Original' it is 'Bachelor of Commerce'. This changes the type of degree and thus the semantic content.
The field of study for Summer 2022 has been changed from 'not found' to 'Business Analytics'.
The level_of_degree for 'Digital Marketing' was changed from 'not found' to 'Summer Program'.
The 'level_of_degree' for the 'Data for Business' entry was changed from 'not found' to 'Summer School'. This alters the semantic content from an unspecified level to a specific type of program.
The level of degree for the study at ESADE Business School changed from 'not found' in 'Original' to 'Summer School' in 'Origin'.

The 'Original' variant lists the field of study as 'Gestion' while the 'Origin' variant has 'not found' for the field. Additionally, the 'level_of_degree' is 'not found' in the 'Original' and 'BTS Gestion' in the 'Origin'. This indicates modifications in terms of field and level of degree information.
The 'Origin' variant has 'level_of_degree' as 'not found' whereas 'Original' has 'Professional Certificate'.
